question: I received my 1st talaaq immediatly after having a miscarrige.I was still bleeding.How do i calculate my iddat period?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
If your Nifaas, lasts till its maximum period, i.e. 40 days or lesser, then your Iddat will be till three menstrual cycles after the Nifaas. (Shaami pg.299; part1)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
